original_text: and Hiram king of Tyre had supplied Solomon with cedar and cypress timber and gold, as much as he desired, King Solomon gave to Hiram twenty cities in the land of Galilee.
korean_text: 갈릴리 땅의 성읍 스무 곳을 히람에게 주었으니 이는 두로 왕 히람이 솔로몬에게 그 온갖 소원대로 백향목과 잣나무와 금을 제공하였음이라

sentences.original_text: and Hiram king of Tyre had supplied Solomon
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 두로 왕 히���은 솔로몬에게 공급했으니

sentences.original_text: with cedar and cypress timber and gold
twenty cities in the land of Galilee
